channel.title: R on Nicci Potts | Blog
channel.description: Recent content in R on Nicci Potts | Blog

item.title: Census data for person centered design
item.description: Mapping census data in R to show how we can use data to put people at the heart of decision making.

item.title: Mapping social survey data
item.description: In this post I will breakdown creating maps from survey data in R, particularly focused on the Scottish Household Survey.
